etomica.modules.multiharmonic

Class DataProcessorVar

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.DataProcessor
      • etomica.modules.multiharmonic.DataProcessorVar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataPipe, IDataSink

    public class DataProcessorVar
extends DataProcessor
    Data Processor whose sole purpose in life is to discard the incoming data and push on the standard deviation from the accumulator. Using this means that the standard deviation will be flowing down the data pipe at the same time as the free energy to which it corresponds.

    • Method Detail

      • getDataCaster

        public DataPipe getDataCaster(IEtomicaDataInfo inputDataInfo)
        Description copied from interface: IDataSink
        Returns a DataProcessor that casts the data that will be given to this DataSink to a form that it can accept. Returns null if the Data is acceptable without casting. Otherwise object that is pushing the Data into this DataSink is responsible for filtering the Data through the returned DataTransformer.
        Parameters:
        inputDataInfo - the DataInfo for the Data that will fed to the sink's putData method

      • processDataInfo

        protected IEtomicaDataInfo processDataInfo(IEtomicaDataInfo inputDataInfo)
        Description copied from class: DataProcessor
        Informs this DataProcessor of the DataInfo for the Data it will be processing. Typically the subclass will use this information to make any objects or otherwise prepare for calls to processData.
        Specified by:
        processDataInfo in class DataProcessor
        Parameters:
        inputDataInfo - the DataInfo of the Data that will be input to this DataProcessor
        Returns:
        the DataInfo of the Data that will be output by this DataProcessor

      • processData

        protected IData processData(IData inputData)
        Description copied from class: DataProcessor
        Processes the input Data and returns Data for pushing to the next DataSink. Returns null if output Data should not (yet) be pushed downstream.
        Specified by:
        processData in class DataProcessor
        Parameters:
        inputData - the Data for processing
        Returns:
        the processed Data, for sending downstream (if not null)
